IS590DV - Data Visualization

This is the course website for IS590 Data Visualization in Spring 2019

Week 12 - Scientific Viz

We talked a little bit about publishing, networks, and scientific viz.

Resources

  • We’ll be using the Isolated Galaxy dataset (292 Mb) dataset for sci viz today
  • We’ll also be using this brain scan data (72Mb)

Outline of Topics

This week our objectives will be very similar to last week: (1) we’ll introduce the concept of scientific visualization, (2) discuss the final project, Part 3, (3) play with yt in Python, (4) continue talking about methods to publish and share your visualizations.

  • Lecture
    1. Scientific visualization - differences between info viz
    2. Scientific visualization - terms, uses, resources
  • Programming
    1. yt in Python
    2. Publishing jupyter notebooks - more details
    3. JS scripting in Idyll webpages if we have time
